sqlMap.select: SELECT EV.id as idEvento, EV.nombre as nombreEvento, EV.estado as estadoEvento, EV.fechaInicio as fechaInicio, EV.fechaFin as fechaFin, EV.cantidadPersonas as cantidadPersonas, EV.horaInicio as horaInicio, EV.horaFin as horaFin, TE.id as idTipoEvento, TE.tipoEvento as tipoEvento, E.rif as rifEmpresa, E.nombre as nombreEmpresa, C.id as idContacto, C.nombre as nombreContacto FROM EMPRESA E, EVENTO EV, TIPO_EVENTO TE, CONTACTO C WHERE EV.idTipoEvento = TE.id AND E.rif = EV.rifEmpresa AND E.rif = C.rifEmpresa AND C.id = EV.idContacto AND EV.id = #idEvento#

SELECT S.id as idSalon, S.nombre as nombreSalon, S.costo as costoSalon, S.habilitado as salonHabilitado, S.idSalon as idSalonFK, ES.nuevoCosto as nuevoCosto, M.id as idTipoMontaje, M.tipoMontaje as tipoMontaje FROM SALON S, EMPRESA E, EVENTO EV, EVENTO_SALA ES, DETALLE_SALA DS, MONTAJE M, TIPO_EVENTO TE, CONTACTO C WHERE S.id = DS.idSalon AND M.id = DS.idMontaje AND ES.idSalon = DS.idSalon AND ES.idMontaje = DS.idMontaje AND EV.idTipoEvento = TE.id AND EV.id = ES.idEvento AND E.rif = EV.rifEmpresa AND E.rif = C.rifEmpresa AND C.id = EV.idContacto AND EV.id = #idEvento#
